unparsed_output:
Fundamentals of Biostatistics M-T-W-Th-F, and the student must also select one of the following morning courses:

Principles and Methods of Epidemiologic Research T-Th-S, or Epidemiology of Occupational Hazards T-Th-S, and Epidemiology of Cancer M-W-F, or Epidemiology of Cardiovascular Diseases M-W-F.
